mapper.select: SELECT P.PA_NO, P.PA_REG, P.PA_NAME, P.PA_SEX, P.PA_BLD_TYPE, P.PA_HEIGHT, P.PA_WEIGHT, P.PA_NOKNM, P.PA_NOKPH, PA_PH, PA_ADD1, PA_ADD2, PZ_ZIP, PA_INSR_YN, C.CLINIC_NO, C.CLINIC_DT, C.EMP_NO, C.ADMI_CD, E.EMP_NAME, ID.IJ_CD, MO.MEDI_CD, TOC.TEST_CD, TROC.TM_CD FROM PATIENT P LEFT JOIN CLINIC_CHART C ON P.PA_NO = C.PA_NO LEFT JOIN INJURY_DIAGNOSIS ID ON C.CLINIC_NO = ID.CLINIC_NO LEFT JOIN MEDICINE_ORDER MO ON C.CLINIC_NO = MO.CLINIC_NO LEFT JOIN TEST_ORDER TOC ON C.CLINIC_NO = TOC.CLINIC_NO LEFT JOIN TREATMENT_ORDER TROC ON C.CLINIC_NO = TROC.CLINIC_NO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE P.PA_NO = #{paNo} ORDER BY C.CLINIC_NO ASC
